"@Number1pegasus":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53fffe71636872224a900000#post_53fffe71636872224a900000

I get my moments of inspiration at 2 am or in the bathroom. I've heard of weirder cases.

There was this guy who, I'm not kidding, had his best ideas after having sex. He got dumped by several girls because he had an idea before either finished and just jumped into his lap and wrote them before they disappeared.
